answerText: "A Perfect Day for Bananafish"[10] "A Perfect Day for Bananafish" is one of the title Nine Stories by this American recluse author of The Catcher in the Rye
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | MIT A + LASA B | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: 18. This story begins with Muriel answering a phone call from her mother. For 10 points each: [10] Name this short story in which Seymour sits on the beach and tells Sybil about the title creatures, which die from overeating a certain fruit.
